# SynchronizationComponent.OwnershipTransferMode.autoAccept

**Case**

Grant ownership requests automatically.

## Declaration

```swift
case autoAccept
```

## Ownership transfer modes

- **SynchronizationComponent.OwnershipTransferMode.manual**: Require explicit ownership request confirmation.
